name: Nathaniel Bibler
biography: Nathaniel Bibler is a private software consultant based in the Central Florida area.  He has been designing web based software since 1994 and has been building and supporting Rails-based systems and applications almost exclusively for the past 3 years.  In that time, he has created or contributed to several Rails plugins including attachment_fu and open_id_authentication as well as provided accepted patches into the Rails core.  He is a long-time member and presenter in the Orlando Ruby User Group.
